MajorClaims.Text: I personally prefer studying in a group due to these noticeable features, getting help from other students, improving my attitude for learning, managing my time in an effective way
I strongly prefer studying in a group of my friends because of some important opportunities gaining with this activity

Claims.Text: When pupils make a group for studying, all member of group have the same chance to help each other
Increasing the motivation and competence spirit are another benefit of group-studying
time management is another brilliant benefit of group-studying
I can receive some helps from other student as well as improving my learning skills, also managing of time is another achievements of group-studying

Premises.Text: They can work together for understanding the complicated aspect of a course
when a group faces with complex math problem, they can share their opinions to solve it
such a remarkable effect has incorporation that all students can improve their weak points in a group
In a group of student, the best of those always encourages others to study harder
pupils often have a tangible competence in order that they can get the highest grade in a group
better learning is one of noticeable result of these competences and encouragements
Group-studying causes some kind of internal obligation to manage the time, inasmuch as we always care about other people and we do not want to waste their time
When the students study with their friends, they should have schedule to use their time in an effective manner
